jd:
Hi,

Greetings of the day! I have an urgent requirement below, please go through JD and let me know if you are comfortable or have any profile. Kindly revert me back with your updated resume as well.

**Job Title:** Global Rollout Project Manager  
**Location:** San Jose, CA (Work from Office)  
**Duration:** Long Term Contract  

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- Proven experience as a Project Manager, with a strong track record of leading global rollouts or implementations.  
- Experience managing end-to-end project lifecycles, from planning through execution, including handling complex data dependencies.  
- Ability to manage multiple stakeholders across different regions and time zones.  
- Strong problem-solving and organizational skills, with the ability to handle technical challenges in real-time.  
- Excellent communication skills with experience presenting project updates to leadership and cross-functional teams.  
- Technical background or familiarity with system integration is a plus.  

**Preferred Experience:**  
- Experience with Service Channel or similar facilities management/operations systems.  
- Prior experience in facilities management, operations, or corporate services within a fast-paced environment.  
- Ability to work global hours to manage international teams and stakeholders.

Thanks & Regards,  
Pradeep Sharma
